void readFromFile (ifstream &file)
 Functions for reading data from file to sign readFromFile() do the following:

  • open input file
  • get certificate name to use for signing
  • read plaintext to be sign.

void writeToFile (ofstream &file)
 Functions for write signature data to file writeToFile() do the following:

  • write certificate used in signing to file
  • write plaintext to be used in verify of signature
  • write signature data to file.

void setSignature (CK_BYTE *sig, CK_ULONG size)
 Functions for allocating buffer memory for signing data setSignature() do the following:

  • allocate space aside in memory for signature buffer
  • insert signature into memory buffer.

void SignedData::readFromFile ( ifstream &  file  ) 

Functions for reading data from file to sign readFromFile() do the following:

  • open input file
  • get certificate name to use for signing
  • read plaintext to be sign.

Return values:
void 
Remarks:

void SignedData::writeToFile ( ofstream &  file  ) 

Functions for write signature data to file writeToFile() do the following:

  • write certificate used in signing to file
  • write plaintext to be used in verify of signature
  • write signature data to file.

Parameters:
[in] file Filename to write data out
Return values:
void 
Remarks:
write signature data and plaintext data to file in order to be used for future verify action.
